name: sRemo
0:
”Alexa, turn on the TV”
”Alexa, turn on the Light”
”Alexa, turn on the Air-conditioner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: When talking to AmazonEcho as "Turn on the TV", you can send TV remote control signal set by sRemo and turn on the TV. In addition to TV, you can operate home appliances that can be operated with infrared remote control such as lights and air conditioners from AmazonEcho.
